paper.title: Neural Network Modeling of F/A-18E Flight Dynamics
paper.abstract: Simulation models are an indispensable tool for the successful development, testing, and sustainment of aircraft. While traditional methods of creating high quality aerodynamic models are laborious and expensive, they are used throughout aircraft sustainment to reduce test burden and mitigate operating risk. Efforts to develop and validate these flight dynamics models require large amounts of dedicated data from expensive tests. This work seeks to reduce the time and financial burdens of obtaining high-quality aircraft flight dynamics models through the use of machine learning methods in the creation of aerodynamic models.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究使用机器学习和神经网络建模飞机飞行动力学，目的是减少时间和财务成本，并未涉及任何金融领域的具体应用。
